CmdLine: apk add --no-cache --virtual=pandoc-deps wget ca-certificates &&     wget https://gitlab.com/ConorIA/alpine-pandoc/raw/master/conor@conr.ca-584aeee5.rsa.pub -O /etc/apk/keys/conor@conr.ca-584aeee5.rsa.pub &&     echo https://conoria.gitlab.io/alpine-pandoc/ >> /etc/apk/repositories &&     apk add --no-cache --repository http://dl-3.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing cmark &&     apk add --no-cache git bash pandoc jq curl zip &&     apk del pandoc-deps
Commands.Name: run
